Class IO

  • java.lang.Object
    • IO
  • public class IO
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for getting all input from the user, including setup and playing of games, navigating the tutorial, reviewing of games, and choosing partitions to simulate.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      IO()

      • getCoordinates

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> getCoordinates​(Board partition,
                                                             java.lang.String outputType)
        Asking the user for co-ordinates
        Parameters:
        partition - partition board, to validate that co-ordinate not already in use
        outputType - type of selection, e.g "white piece"
        Returns:
        Arraylist of 2 co-ordinates, x = index 0, y = index 1, or null if user finished

      • getPartitionFirstToMove

        public int getPartitionFirstToMove()
        Getting who moves first for simulating the partition, from the user
        Returns:
        Player who moves first, 0 for white, 1 for black
